content:
# I have successfully gathered 10 units of iron ore, and my inventory now contains 8 units of wood and 10 units of iron ore.

# Next, I need to smelt the iron ore into iron plates. To do this, I will need to place a furnace and ensure it has fuel to operate.

# First, I will place a stone furnace. Since I don't have one in my inventory, I need to craft it. 
# I will check if I have enough wood to craft the stone furnace.

assert inspect_inventory().get(Prototype.Wood, 0) >= 3, "Not enough wood to craft a stone furnace"

# Now, I will craft the stone furnace.
craft_item(Prototype.StoneFurnace)  # Crafting the stone furnace

# Checking inventory after crafting the furnace
print(f"Inventory after crafting furnace: {inspect_inventory()}")
